description.en: Gives the character 1 cheer point and +10% Exp. for 10 Min.
description.ar: Gives the character 1 cheer point and +10% Exp. for 10 Min.
description.br: Fornece 1 ponto de ânimo ao personagem e +10% de Experiência por 10 minutos.
description.cns: 鼓励对方，目标经验值+10%，持续10分钟。
description.de: Es ist möglich sich selbst anzufeuern und einen Cheer Point zu erhalten.
description.fi: Gives the character 1 cheer point and +10% Exp. for 10 Min.
description.fil: Gives the character 1 cheer point and +10% Exp. for 10 Min.
description.fr: Donne 1 point d'encouragement au personnage et + 10% d'Exp. pendant 10 min.
description.id: Memberi karakter 1 poin bersorak dan +10% Exp. selama 10 menit
description.it: Gives the character 1 cheer point and +10% Exp. for 10 Min.
description.jp: 自己応援可能、他人応援ポイント＋1獲得
description.kr: 자기 응원 가능, 타인 응원 포인트 +1 획득
description.nl: Gives the character 1 cheer point and +10% Exp. for 10 Min.
description.pl: Gives the character 1 cheer point and +10% Exp. for 10 Min.
description.ru: Дают 1 очко ободрения и увеличивают получаемый опыт на 10% на 10 минут.
description.sp: Le da al personaje 1 punto de ánimo y +10% Exp. durante 10 Min.
description.sw: Gives the character 1 cheer point and +10% Exp. for 10 Min.
description.th: มอบคะแนนเชียร์ 1 ให้กับตัวละครและ +10% EXP เป็นเวลา 10 นาที
description.tw: 給予玩家 1點鼓勵點數，並在 10 分鐘內經驗值 +10% 。
description.vi: Cung cấp cho nhân vật 1 điểm cổ vũ và + 10% Exp. trong 10 phút.
